info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 10:01PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Union County through 1030 PM EDT... At 1001 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles southwest of Monroe, or 5 miles east of Mineral Springs, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Monroe, Wesley Chapel, Wingate, Waxhaw, Mineral Springs, Weddington, Marvin, Jaars and Trinity. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
